featured.text: Many weight-conscious people also mistakenly believe that changing our bodies will fix everything.

definition.zh_def: 修理或修正某物，使其恢復正常或改善狀態。
definition.en_def: To repair or correct something to restore it to a normal or improved condition.
definition.example: I need to fix my bike before the weekend.
